law.catch_line: With respect to any loan made at a rate pursuant to § 12-103(a) and (c) or § 12-404 of this title,...
law.text: With respect to any loan made at a rate pursuant to § 12-103(a) and (c) or § 12-404 of this title, the lender must comply with § 14-1302 of this article except that subsection (c) of § 14-1302 is not applicable.
